c:/Sandbox/amop/amop_project/trunk/amop/source/FastDelegateBind.h

00001 //                                              FastDelegateBind.h 
00002 //  Helper file for FastDelegates. Provides bind() function, enabling
00003 //  FastDelegates to be rapidly compared to programs using boost::function and boost::bind.
00004 //
00005 //  Documentation is found at http://www.codeproject.com/cpp/FastDelegate.asp
00006 //
00007 //              Original author: Jody Hagins.
00008 //               Minor changes by Don Clugston.
00009 //
00010 // Warning: The arguments to 'bind' are ignored! No actual binding is performed.
00011 // The behaviour is equivalent to boost::bind only when the basic placeholder 
00012 // arguments _1, _2, _3, etc are used in order.
00013 //
00014 // HISTORY:
00015 //      1.4 Dec 2004. Initial release as part of FastDelegate 1.4.
00016 
00017 
00018 #ifndef FASTDELEGATEBIND_H
00019 #define FASTDELEGATEBIND_H
00020 #if _MSC_VER > 1000
00021 #pragma once
00022 #endif // _MSC_VER > 1000
00023 
00025 //                                              FastDelegate bind()
00026 //
00027 //                              bind() helper function for boost compatibility.
00028 //                              (Original author: Jody Hagins).
00029 //
00030 // Add another helper, so FastDelegate can be a dropin replacement
00031 // for boost::bind (in a fair number of cases).
00032 // Note the elipses, because boost::bind() takes place holders
00033 // but FastDelegate does not care about them.  Getting the place holder
00034 // mechanism to work, and play well with boost is a bit tricky, so
00035 // we do the "easy" thing...
00036 // Assume we have the following code...
00037 //      using boost::bind;
00038 //      bind(&Foo:func, &foo, _1, _2);
00039 // we should be able to replace the "using" with...
00040 //      using fastdelegate::bind;
00041 // and everything should work fine...
00043 
00044 #ifdef FASTDELEGATE_ALLOW_FUNCTION_TYPE_SYNTAX
00045 
00046 namespace fastdelegate {
00047 
00048 //N=0
00049 template <class X, class Y, class RetType>
00050 FastDelegate< RetType (  ) >
00051 bind(
00052     RetType (X::*func)(  ),
00053     Y * y,
00054     ...)
00055 { 
00056   return FastDelegate< RetType (  ) >(y, func);
00057 }
00058 
00059 template <class X, class Y, class RetType>
00060 FastDelegate< RetType (  ) >
00061 bind(
00062     RetType (X::*func)(  ) const,
00063     Y * y,
00064     ...)
00065 { 
00066   return FastDelegate< RetType (  ) >(y, func);
00067 }
00068 
00069 //N=1
00070 template <class X, class Y, class RetType, class Param1>
00071 FastDelegate< RetType ( Param1 p1 ) >
00072 bind(
00073     RetType (X::*func)( Param1 p1 ),
00074     Y * y,
00075     ...)
00076 { 
00077   return FastDelegate< RetType ( Param1 p1 ) >(y, func);
00078 }
00079 
00080 template <class X, class Y, class RetType, class Param1>
00081 FastDelegate< RetType ( Param1 p1 ) >
00082 bind(
00083     RetType (X::*func)( Param1 p1 ) const,
00084     Y * y,
00085     ...)
00086 { 
00087   return FastDelegate< RetType ( Param1 p1 ) >(y, func);
00088 }
